description: This file implements a recommendation service for roles related to Chief Architect positions, using adjacency overlap datasets. It filters, scores, and augments role recommendations with related resources based on role/competency tags.

classes.name: Recommendation
classes.description: Data class representing a role recommendation with associated score, overlap percentage, and resources.

classes.name: Resource
classes.description: Data class representing a resource with ID, title, URL, and tags.

methods.name: list[Resource] _resource_suggestions_for_role(role: str)
methods.description: Generates a list of resource suggestions based on the provided role, using simple keyword matching.

methods.name: List[Recommendation] recommend_for_ca(min_overlap: float = 55.0, limit: int = 10)
methods.description: Main function that retrieves adjacency data, filters, sorts, and returns role recommendations for Chief Architect.
